name: Nanobotica
description:
WASD or Arrow Keys – Move

Left Ctrl or Left Mouse Button – Cleanse (You move slower while cleansing)

New nanobot technology could be a game changer in fighting viruses. You are a nanobot guaranteed to be 99% effective at killing viruses. Do not let your patient down.

All sprites, code, and music were created in three hours.

NegativeZero: Music

Timmay: Code

Zuratu: Art and Sound
